text.0: to agni lofty asura meet for worship steer of eternal law my prayer i offer.
text.1: i bring my song directed to the mighty like pure oil for his mouth at sacrifices.
text.2: mark the law thou who knowest yea observe it send forth the full streams of eternal order.
text.3: i use no sorcery with might or falsehood the sacred law of the red steer i follow.
text.4: how hast thou follower of the law eternal become the knower of a new song agni.
text.5: the god the guardian of the seasons knows me the lord of him who won this wealth i know not.
text.6: who agni in alliance with thy foeman what splendid helpers won for them their riches.
text.7: agni who guard the dwellingplace of falsehood who are protectors of the speech of liars.
text.8: agni those friends of thine have turned them from thee gracious of old they have become ungracious.
text.9: they have deceived themselves by their own speeches uttering wicked words against the righteous.
text.10: he who pays sacrifice to thee with homage o agni keeps the red steers law eternal.
text.11: wide is his dwelling may the noble offspring of nahuṣa who wandered forth come hither.
